# timelocked
Record the amount of time that a machien is locked or unlocked for.

This is unreviewed AI-generated code.

## Motivation
I have a treadmill desk. See r/musicaltreadmilldesk on reddit. When I am using it the machien is unlocked. I want to time the amont of time I use the machine.


## Installation
pipx install timelocked

## Usage

timelocked --daemon

timelocked # get's information

see --help

## About
I am interested in individual's agecy against the world. I make tools for raeding @readwithai. I also make a stream of tools to give individaul's agnecy. You might like to follow this stream on github.
